title: TOGGLE_PAUSED_RENDERPHASES
content:
0xDFC252D8A3E15AB70x30ADE541// TogglePausedRenderphases
void TOGGLE_PAUSED_RENDERPHASES(BOOL toggle);Parameters:toggle: Setting it to false will exclude render updates as mentioned in the description, until it's set back to true.Switches the rendering display to exclude everything except PostFX, resulting in a frozen screen before the UI pass.Old name:  _ENABLE_GAMEPLAY_CAMOld name:  _SET_FROZEN_RENDERING_DISABLED
